tagRef.tooltip: optional. only allow this event when used on this model

stringid.name: Variant
stringid.tooltip: optional. only allow this event when used on this model variant

tagRef.name: Model
tagRef.tooltip: optional. only allow this event when used on this model

stringid.name: Variant
stringid.tooltip: optional. only allow this event when used on this model variant

tagblock.name: Blend Screens
tagblock.tooltip: Legacy field - please edit in NEW blend screens block below

tagblock.name: Animations

bit.name: Use Custom Blend-In Time
bit.tooltip: when possible, interpolate into this animation using the 'blend in' time value below

bit.name: Translate And Scale Root Only
bit.tooltip: ignore all transition and scale on all nodes except the root

bit.name: Enable Blend-Out On Replacement Anims
bit.tooltip: fade out this animation as they reach the end of the animation.

bit.name: Use Custom Blend-Out Time
bit.tooltip: when possible, fade this animation out over the 'blend out' time below (requires 'enable blend-out' above, replacement anims only)

bit.name: Override Player Input With Motion
bit.tooltip: use the movement data in this anim instead of player physics (player only)

bit.name: Do Not Inherit For Player Graphs

tagblock.comment: If this animation contains PCA blend shape animation, provide the name of the PCA Group to which it belongs. These groups should be present in the PCA Groups block.
data which may be shared by one or more animations

tagblock.name: Frame Events
tagblock.tooltip: Legacy field - please edit in new frame event tag above

tagblock.tooltip: Legacy field - please edit in new frame event tag above

stringid.name: Intermediate Gait Name
stringid.tooltip: animation name used for the speed variations

stringid.name: Source Marker
stringid.tooltip: the marker name on this object where the point of attachment is

stringid.name: Destination Marker
stringid.tooltip: the marker name of the attachment destination point

int16.name: Rank
int16.tooltip: calculated during post process where rank is default ordinal for solving

int16.name: Antecedents
int16.tooltip: calculated during post process where bit index represents chain index

plugin.comment: For each PCA Group desired, provide a unique name and desired number of blend shapes. Then, assign animations to these groups by setting their pca group name field

tagref.name: PCA Animation
tagref.tooltip: This is where all the imported pca blend shape animation is stored

stringid.name: State Name
stringid.tooltip: name of the state this transition starts in

stringid.name: Mode Name
stringid.tooltip: name of the mode this transition ends in

stringid.name: State Name
stringid.tooltip: name of the state this transition ends in

stringid.name: Marker
stringid.tooltip: the marker name on the object being attached

stringid.name: Attach To Marker
stringid.tooltip: the marker name object (weapon, vehicle, etc.) the above marker is being attached to

float32.name: Animation Parameter
float32.tooltip: Numerical value associated with the ranged action animation (e.g. velocity for jumps)

stringid.name: Marker
stringid.tooltip: the marker name on the object being attached

stringid.name: Attach To Marker
stringid.tooltip: the marker name object (weapon, vehicle, etc.) the above marker is being attached to

tagblock.name: Vehicle Suspension

stringid.name: Marker Name
stringid.tooltip: this marker should be parented to the vehicle root node

stringid.name: Contact Marker Name
stringid.tooltip: this marker should be parented to the wheel node

float32.name: Mass Point Offset
float32.tooltip: distance along the vehicle's up direction to move the wheel from the marker location

tagblock.comment: Only Necessary for suspensions with a destroyed state

plugin.comment: The Node Map block should have the same count as the Inherited Graph's nodes. Each Local Node value corresponds to the nodes of THIS graph. If there is no matching node, -1 is acceptable. The Node Map Flags reflect which nodes in the Node Map are used, meaning a bit should be unchecked if it is -1 in the map. Root z Offset allows for differences in height. Updates in realtime so poke around until it looks how you want. Starting at Reach, a new Inheritance block was added, use that. ("New") Unlike Halo 3, Graph Index is obsolete, so inheritance is done right inside the Animations block with a tag reference and animation index.
fields used by various compression codecs to store shared or global data for this graph.
